b:if.b:template-skin: body#layout #slide-item,body#layout #config{display:block!important;margin-top: 15px;}body#layout #loading{display:none!important;}body#layout{ background-color: #000; margin: 0; padding: 10px;}body#layout div.section{ border-radius: 10px; background: #03a9f4; border: none; width: 94%;}body#layout .Blog .widget-content { height: 16em; border-radius: 10px;}body#layout #configuracoes{ display:block; background: #002e42; color: #03a9f4;}body#layout #configuracoes .widget-content{ background: #00405b; color: #03a9f4;}body#layout #configuracoes .widget-wrap2{ display: contents;} body#layout *{box-sizing: border-box;}body#layout #rodape{display: flex;}body#layout:before{content:'Template Tênis 3D - Blogger Profissional';font-size:20px;color:#03a9f4;text-align:center; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;}#menu-principal { padding: 0; height: auto;}.Local-dos-posts { width: auto; margin: 0; margin-top: 0;}

div.style: position: fixed;top: 0;left: 0;z-index: 10;width: 100%;height: 100%;background: var(--fundocarregando);display: flex;justify-content: center;align-items: center;

position: fixed; background: #fff; z-index: 99; width: 80vw; height: 80vh; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); box-shadow: 0 0 10vw #000; gap: 2vw; display: none; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; margin-left: 50vw; margin-top: 50vh; box-sizing: border-box; border-radius: 4vw; padding: 4vw; overflow: auto;

div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "

center.p: A página que você está procurando não existe.

a.style: background: var(--fundomenu);color: var(--letramenu);padding: 20px 50px;text-decoration: none;display: block;width: fit-content;border-radius: 10px;font-size: 50px;margin-top: 50px;

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Teste HTML com iframe de Mapa.
